name: ViewLink
0:
”Alexa show the front door”
”Alexa go home”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the ViewLink Skill and Alexa, you can now access your ViewLink Cameras via voice control by simply saying "Alexa, show my front door." Before you get started, please make sure your ViewLink device is online and updated to the latest firmware. 
Then enable the ViewLink Skill in Alexa app and you will be directed to link your ViewLink account with your Alexa account.
You can view live feed and listen to the audio from your ViewLink devices.
It also works with the shared users so anyone with access to the camera can view the activity by Alexa.
